node.title: Welcome to the Everything2 community!
node.doctext:
,

Welcome to Everything2, one of the internet's oldest and largest writing communities. You are receiving this message because someone gave this email address when registering on Everything2.

We hope that you have registered because you like what you have read on Everything2 and want to contribute. If you have only read a little of the site, please take the time to explore it some more before making your own contribution. In principle, everything has a place on Everything2, but that doesn't mean there is a place for just any old thing. The links at the bottom of writeup pages are a useful way to take a random walk through the site and get a feel for it. You may also find E2 Quick Start useful reading.

Verifying your account

To complete the registration process, click on the following link, or copy and paste it into your web browser:

&user_id=&validationkey=

If for some reason the link does not work, you can validate your account manually: on any Everything2 page, enter "Verify your email account" in the search box and click on the 'search' button. You will be taken to a page where you will be asked for your user ID, which is , and your validation key, which is .

All the best,

The Everything2 Staff
